name: PyHTCPCP : free impl. of RFC 2324
short_description: pyhtcpcp is a free implementation of the HTCPCP protocol, defined in RFC 2324 (http://www.faqs.org/rfcs/rfc2324.html). It provides two Python modules : htcpcpserver.py and htcpcpclient.py, and many example files for these modules.
